name: EHDSDevice
title: Device model
description: EHDS refined base model for Device information

element.short: Device model
element.definition: EHDS refined base model for Device information

element.short: Normalised identifier of the device instance, such as UDI according to REGULATION (EU) 2017/745. Multiple identifiers can be used.
element.definition: Normalised identifier of the device instance, such as UDI according to REGULATION (EU) 2017/745. Multiple identifiers can be used.

element.short: Name of device manufacturer
element.definition: Name of device manufacturer

element.short: The date and time when the device was manufactured
element.definition: The date and time when the device was manufactured

element.short: The date and time beyond which this device is no longer valid or should not be used (if applicable).
element.definition: The date and time beyond which this device is no longer valid or should not be used (if applicable).

element.short: Lot number of manufacture
element.definition: Lot number of manufacture

element.short: Serial number assigned by the manufacturer
element.definition: Serial number assigned by the manufacturer

element.short: The name and name type of the device as known to the manufacturer and/or patient
element.definition: The name and name type of the device as known to the manufacturer and/or patient

element.short: The manufacturer's model number for the device
element.definition: The manufacturer's model number for the device

element.short: The actual design of the device or software version running on the device
element.definition: The actual design of the device or software version running on the device

element.short: Device type
element.definition: Device type

element.short: Device notes and comments
element.definition: Device notes and comments
